plain: 12 Monkeys, Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope, 2001: A Space Odyssey, Apocalypse Now, The Day the Earth Stood Still, and Mad Max are all considered to be science fiction. Brazil is considered to be dystopian fiction. Gattaca is considered to be a science fiction drama. The Matrix is considered to be a science fiction action film. American Beauty is considered to be a drama. Being John Malkovich is considered to be a dark comedy. Kolya is considered to be a drama. Metropolis is considered to be a science fiction film. Bottle Rocket is considered to be a comedy. Babe is considered to be a drama. Alien is considered to be a science fiction horror film. Groundhog Day is considered to be a comedy.
